:D

Tom C

Just noticed six of the SLers have severely miscut backs. Enough for almost the entire P of the next card is showing. I need to update pricing and will try to post pics tonight. There are quite a few others that the backs are way off center but not like these. Also one card (Barry) has only the very top of his name at the bottom and no name on top. Will adjust this one as well.

Tom C
PM sent for the Cad Coles.

All cards $18 and under are now sold. I will update the post later this evening and hope to ship cards out to those who have placed orders tomorrow.

Tom C

Hi Tom.  I bought the Waddell portrait last week, received it, no problems.  Then today I open my mail and Waddell throwing is in there.  Now I love receiving free 06's but I'm pretty sure someone else paid for it because I know I didn't.   Please advise.  Thanks dennis
